contentrichtext.text: '''Zestoa''' ([[Spanish language|Spanish]], ''Cestona'') is a town located in the province of [[Gipuzkoa]], in the [[Autonomous Community]] of the [[Basque Country (autonomous community)|Basque Country]], northern [[Spain]]. ==External links== * [http://www.zestoa.net/ Official Website] Information available in [[Spanish language|Spanish]] and [[Basque language|Basque]]. * [http://www.euskomedia.org/euskomedia/SAunamendi?idi=en&op=7&voz=ZESTOA ZESTOA in the Bernardo Estornés Lasa - Auñamendi Encyclopedia (Euskomedia Fundazioa)] Information available in [[Spanish language|Spanish]] {{Municipalities in Gipuzkoa}} {{coord|43.2400|N|2.2580|W|region:ES_type:city|display=title}} [[Category:Municipalities in Gipuzkoa]] [[Category:Populated places in Gipuzkoa]] {{Basque-geo-stub}}
